verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus wants me for a sunbeam, To shine for Him each day; In ev'ry way try to please Him, At home, at school, at play.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: A sunbeam, a sunbeam, Jesus wants me for a sunbeam; A sunbeam, a sunbeam, I’ll be a sunbeam for Him.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus wants me to be loving, And kind to all I see; Showing how pleasant and happy, His little one can be.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I will ask Jesus to help me To keep my heart from sin; Ever reflecting His goodness, And always shine for Him.

verse.name: v4
